summary: Comprehensive testing of Floating Action Button (FAB) feature for quick task progress updates. All features tested and working correctly across all pages (Dashboard, Tasks, Gantt Chart, Quick Update, Reports). Backend APIs (PUT /api/tasks/{id}/progress, GET /api/tasks/{id}/history) fully functional.

issues: React hydration warning: span cannot be child of tbody - does not affect functionality

passed_tests: FAB visible on Dashboard page
FAB visible on Tasks page
FAB visible on Gantt Chart page
FAB visible on Quick Update page
FAB visible on Reports page
FAB click opens Quick Update dialog
Task search trigger displays correctly
Task search dropdown opens on click
Search by task name works (found 13 tasks for 'RCC Work')
Search by task ID works (found results for ID 20)
Task selection shows update form with task info
Progress slider displays correctly
Quick percentage buttons (0%, 25%, 50%, 75%, 100%) all work
Update notes input field works
View History link opens history view
Back to update button returns to update form
Save Update button successfully saves progress
Dialog closes after successful save
PUT /api/tasks/{id}/progress endpoint works correctly
GET /api/tasks/{id}/history endpoint returns update history
Progress updates are logged in task history with notes
seed_data_creation: None - used existing seeded tasks for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: FAB feature fully tested and working. The floating action button appears on all pages at bottom-24 right-6 position (above Emergent badge). Uses shadcn Command component for searchable dropdown. All progress updates are persisted and logged to task_history collection.
